required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Fosrenol Post-marketing Surveillance for Hemodialysis in Japan
clinical_study.official_title: Special Drug Use Investigation of Fosrenol (Long-term Investigation for Patients With Hemodialysis)

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a regulatory post marketing surveillance in Japan, and it is a local prospective and observational study of patients in hemodialysis who received Fosrenol for hyperphosphatemia. The objective of this study is to assess safety and efficacy of using Fosrenol in clinical practice. A total 3,000 patients will be recruited and followed 5 years.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse drug reactions in subjects who received Fosrenol
primary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 8 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Timing of onset of common ADRs related to the priority survey items
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 8 years
secondary_outcome.description: The items are Gastrointestinal symptoms Secondary hyperparathyroidism Hypocalcaemia and decreased blood calcium

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect on bones: Alkaline phosphatase over time
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 8 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect on bones: Change in bone density
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 8 years
After Fosrenol administration, up to 8 years
After Fosrenol administration, up to 8 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Serum P, albumin-corrected serum Ca and serum intact PTH, and Ca-P product over time
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 8 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients achieving the serum P control goal
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 8 years

intervention.description: Patients in hemodialysis who have received Fosrenol for hyperphosphatemia.

study_pop.textblock: The target population of this study is patients who have received a prescription of Fosrenol on the basis of the decision of the physician. The study is expected to collect data of 3,000 patients in about 300 practices in Japan.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients undergoing hemodialysis who received Fosrenol for hyperphosphatemia
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who are contraindicated based on the product label
